idea-plugin.name: DevTrackr - Time Tracking for Developers
idea-plugin.description:
Track how long you work on projects and files in JetBrains IDEs.

Boost your productivity with DevTrackr, the seamless time-tracking plugin for JetBrains IDEs. Track your coding sessions automatically, gain insights into your workflow, and optimize your development process — all without leaving your editor.

Key Features:

  • ✅ Automatic time tracking for coding sessions
  • ✅ Detailed insights on project time allocation
  • ✅ Seamless integration with popular version control platforms
  • ✅ Real-time productivity analytics and reports
  • ✅ Lightweight and non-intrusive — no manual timers required

Visit devtrackr.com for more information and updates.
idea-plugin.change-notes: Initial release of DevTrackr for JetBrains IDEs.
